page.title: 05Glenalmond College terms
page.content: From a Junior boy's Summer Saturday: The boy leaves his{cube}(cubicle) and rushes down the{Corkscrew}(staircase) to do a{Phys}(punishment),given by a {C.R.Beak}(school prefect). He{fags}at breakfast in{Hall,}goes to Chapel and then lessons. Afterwards,he dashes through the{Cloisters,}takes his lunch for his{Docket}(an afternoon free for excursions). He goes down to{Deep {Hole}(a pool in the R.Almond),along to {White Bridge}and on to{Slate Quarries. He returns by{Jacob's ladder}(steps up from the river), has supper and goes out to{Front Slopes}until{Roll Call and bedtime. {HOUSES:}Goodacre's, Matheson's, Patchell's, Skrine's - in-college. Cairnies,Reid's - out houses. {HALF DAYS:}Tuesday,Thursday,Saturday - no afternoon lessons. No lessons on Sunday.
